Time Inc. Human Resources and Personnel Records

Union Relations contains the Personnel office's research and work on job classifications, and Time Inc.'s interactions and negotiations with the Newspaper Guild of New York. Besides Steed's records, there are records from Louis Gratz in the Labor Relations office, which was not part of Personnel. These records are comingled with Steed's records, and Steed might have inherited them. The records include meeting minutes and a salary study from the Continuing Classification Committee, copies of union contracts from other news organizations along with other research dating back to 1939, Time Inc. job descriptions, and Time Inc.'s union contracts.
